abstract: Oracle’s deal for Sun raises questions about the future of MySQL, but The 451 Group argues that the open-source database business is more valuable alive than dead to the software giant.
snippet: Oracle’s deal for Sun raises questions about the future of MySQL, but The 451 Group argues that the open-source database business is more valuable alive than dead to the software giant.
lead_paragraph: Some suspect that Oracle will kill the database competitor MySQL that it would inherit with its proposed acquisition of Sun Microsystems.

headline.main: What Will Oracle Do With MySQL?
